entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
